Chefless Operating Model

3 Brands. 1 Kitchen. Multiple Revenue Streams.

Run Aroma Chai (offline QSR + Online) along with BreadHub & My Fries (cloud kitchens) from one setup. One investment. Offline + online demand. Scalable food business.

Why This Isn't Like Most Caf√© Franchises

Most caf√©s depend entirely on walk-in footfall. This model is built to perform even when footfall is average.

Chai = Predictable Demand

Chai is a daily habit. Unlike trend-based food categories, demand stays consistent across seasons and locations.

Built-In Online Revenue

Aroma Chai, BreadHub and My Fries operate as cloud kitchens from the same setup on Swiggy and Zomato. Same rent. Same team. Additional revenue.

Chefless Operations

No dependency on skilled chefs. Standardised processes. Easier hiring and smoother daily operations.

How the 3-Brand Model Improves Profit Potential

One setup. Three brands. Better utilisation of space, staff, and time.

Aroma Chai ‚Äì Offline QSR + Cloud Kitchen

Walk-in customers for chai, bun maska, samosa, pakoda and snacks. High-frequency, low-ticket orders create steady daily cash flow + online sales.

BreadHub ‚Äì Cloud Kitchen

Online-only sandwich brand running from the same kitchen. Higher average order value without additional rent.

My Fries ‚Äì Cloud Kitchen

High-margin fries and combo meals. Popular category on food delivery platforms.

One rent. One team. Three brands.

Offline + online demand working together to improve ROI potential compared to single-brand outlets.

Who This Franchise Is For

This Is Right For You If:

  • You want a business with daily, repeat demand
  • You are comfortable with a QSR operating model
  • You can be involved during setup and early operations
  • You prefer a proven system over starting from scratch

This Is Not For You If:

  • You are looking for completely passive income
  • You expect guaranteed returns
  • You are unwilling to follow brand SOPs
  • You do not have working capital beyond setup costs

Honesty Statement: This is an operator-driven business, not a passive investment. When executed well, the model is designed to scale sustainably.
